Constructor

Parameters:
warnSF - Store and Forward warning
chatTimeout - Chat timeout
isComposingTimeout - Is-composing timeout
maxGroupChatParticipants - Max participants in a group chat
maxMsgLengthSingleChat - Max length of a message in a single chat
maxMsgLengthGroupChat - Max length of a message in a group chat
maxSingleChat - Max single chats
maxGroupChat - Max group chats
smsFallback - SMS fallback
autoAcceptSingleChat - Auto accept mode for single chat
autoAcceptGroupChat - Auto accept mode for group chat
displayedDeliveryReport - Displayed delivery report

isImWarnSF

public boolean isImWarnSF()
Does the UX should alert the user that messages are handled differently when the store and forward functionality is involved. It returns True if user should be informed when sending message to offline user.

Returns:
Boolean

public int getChatTimeout()
Returns the time after inactive chat session could be closed

isSmsFallback

public boolean isSmsFallback()
Does the UX proposes automatically a SMS fallback in case of chat initiation failure. It returns True if SMS fallback procedure is activated, else returns False.

Returns:
Boolean

isChatAutoAcceptMode

public boolean isChatAutoAcceptMode()
Returns True if auto accept mode activated for chat, else returns False
